Class VUSB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xensource.xenapi.XenAPIObject
      • com.xensource.xenapi.VUSB

  • public class VUSB
extends XenAPIObject
    Describes the vusb device First published in XenServer 7.3.

                                  org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
